quests.name: Slow and Steady
objectives:
Gather the materials needed to craft a Slow Cooker.
  ‧ 6 Iron Ingot.
  ‧ 2 Tinkering Parts.
  ‧ 20 Hardwood.
  ‧ 2.5K Dreamlight.
Place your Slow Cooker in the Valley.
Cook 3 Gumbo with your Slow Cooker.

Collect your meals from the Slow Cooker.
  ‧ (It will take some time for the Slow Cooker to finish!)
Talk to Tiana about your Slow Cooker.
